lines.text: the ultimate sulk.
You should just try suicide, it's quicker.
Not the way you do it!
I couldn't have an abortion. I could never walk past another branch of Mothercare again.
Why if I'm dying do I feel so randy all the time?
What makes you think you're dying?
Your embarrassment with the word for one thing.
[Ward sister cannot look at him]

[Bancroft's parents come to visit him in hospital]
How are you son?
[goes to shake Bancroft's hand]
Oh put it away. He has no wish to be impressed with your wrestling grip.

[slightly thrown off his stride]
You're looking good...He is you know.

[quiet but angrily to his father]
She just insulted you...don't you care?
I'm a nine foot freak!
Well how come you're a pregnant, nine foot, freak?

[Coma patient Mr. Lightowler passes gas]
Does he do that a lot?
It's his one little vanity. He likes to keep the impression he's still alive.
So, what do you do when you're not wearing funny noses?
I'm a solicitor.
I could've been killed. You stupid fuck.
Right.
Is she fast?
